forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening, then windy with periods of showers late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming windy with showers developing overnight. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 55F. SE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
